attributes.action: Expel Uganda from the Commonwealth - Discriminatory Homophobic Legislation.
attributes.additional_details: Make this a Bill. Uganda are failing to comply with and intfact are vioating the principles in the Commonwealth Charter.
attributes.background:
Expel Uganda from the Commonwealth of Nations.
Publicly discuss and voteon the current anti homophobic legislation in Uganda. Failing to comply with Commonwealth Charter.

rejection.details:
Decisions about suspending or expelling membership of the Commonwealth are a matter for the Commonwealth Ministerial Action Group (CMAG), not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign: 

'Offer asylum to all LGBTQ+ Ugandans facing persecution in Uganda'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636167

'Stop UK Aid money going to organisations with an anti-LGBTQ agenda'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638556
